sn51.31:1.3: katamesam dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta moggallano bhikkhu evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo”ti?
sn51.31:2.2: “catunnam kho, bhikkhave, iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta moggallano bhikkhu evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo.
sn51.31:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, moggallano bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti—
sn51.31:3.3: iti me chando na ca atilino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.31:3.5: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.31:3.6: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.31:3.7: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
sn51.31:3.8: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.31:3.12: iti me vimamsa na ca atilina bhavissati, na ca atippaggahita bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitta bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitta bhavissati …pe…
sn51.31:3.13: iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.31:3.14: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta moggallano bhikkhu evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo.
sn51.31:4.1: Imesanca pana, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta moggallano bhikkhu evam anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti.
sn51.31:4.2: Imesanca pana, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta moggallano bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
